document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce45c">passes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c4ff">stay. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5868ff">quality </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e0ff">loss </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cca8ff">Affecting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">Content </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">Trade </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e0ff">suddenly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">encroached </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4840ff">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#10ff7a">Sacrament </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
